- Release Notes 

   Here's the first full length from this incredible old school thrash band.
   Fans of old Exodus(their name is an exodus album) and Slayer and a good 
   sense of humour will love this. What a perfect summer saturday to crack a 
   beer, spark up a j, put this record on and remember who hooks you up. Pick 
   this limited edition version up in stores a litlte less than3 weeks from 
   now.

Limited Version available which comes with a bonus 3" CD containing 2 bonus
tracks
